p: Compound 8 g was evaluated in vivo in a mouse model of systemic candidiasis. Survival of mice was significantly ( p < 0.01) higher in fluconazole and 8 g groups than in the control group ( Figure 2). In the fluconazole group (3 x 5 mg/kg) and in the 8 g group (3 x 20 mg/kg), all mice survived. Moreover, a treatment three times a day (3 x 20 mg/kg) was significantly ( p < 0.05) more effective than twice a day (2 x 30 mg/kg).
